sentences: Keegi rahuneb, kellegi viha, pahameel, ärritus, tusatuju lahtub.
Mõnda aega pidas viha, aga siis andis süda järele.
Kui marru läheb, siis paneb minema! Kui süda üle läheb, tuleb tagasi, nagu midagi põleks old.
context: The word 'annab' is the third-person singular present indicative form of the Estonian verb 'andma', which means 'to give'. In the provided context, it specifically refers to giving way to someone's anger or yielding in a situation. It can be used when someone gives up their position or lets go of their anger after holding onto it for some time.
